title: shrI bAlasubrahmaNya
sahitya:
shrI bAlasubrahmaNyA agacchAgragaNya shrI cidAnanda nAtha varENya


anupallavi

 AbAla gOpA vidita dInasharaNya Atma prakAsha lAvaNya kAruNya


caraNam   sanakAdi sannuta svAminAtha svAmi shaila sthita sOmatAta kanaka vallI dEva-
sEnOpEta kaivalya dAtas-sakrd-vibhAta vanaja vadana pada pankEruha varadAshrita 
kalpa mahIruha manasija sanakAdi sEvita kumAra dhIratara hara guruguha
